name: Gardez
description:
Gardez

Chatter fills the air, the queen is in danger. In the shadows you stalk the castle halls, the guards can sense but not see you. Bide your time and finish the job.

Instructions

Recommended to play in full screen. Click on green tiles to move, capture enemies and avoid projectiles.

Credits

  • Jacob Slone
  • Miguel Sotolongo

Additional Credits (thank you open source!)

  • LowPolyDungeonLite and LowPolyDungeon (by Broken Vector)
  • Dagger Drawn Sound by freefire66 (freesound)
  • Tension Orchestra by frankum (freesound)
  • Panic-Background-Music by migfus (freesound)
  • Collect-1 by justinvole (freesound)

Submission for the bullet hell jam of 2022 with the theme confined. With the theme and jam in consideration we flipped the bullet hell concept upside down and tackled creating a turn based bullet hell experience. Enjoy!
